topic.title: Generate Verilog model â€“ library seq_ulvt

ol.li: Use Cadence Liberate* to create the Verilog model. The tool uses the .lib file as the source information for the cells:liberate --trio $INTEL_LCK/common_tcls/gen_verilog.tcl out_dir_probe_fix_index/PV/allcells/lib783_i0m_180h_50pp_seq_ulvt_tttt_0p700v_85c_tttt_ ctyp_nldm.lib lib783_i0m_180h_50pp_seq_ulvt |& tee logs/gen_verilog.log
Review the Verilog model files in the directory ./verilog, and then copy to the golden DB area:cp verilog/*.v $LDK_WORKAREA/training/setup/cadence/ldk/stdcells_1278.ldk_demo_lib/verilog/
